title: AI Ethics & Change Management Specialist (F/H/X)
description:
Syensqo is all about chemistry. We’re not just referring to chemical reactions here, but also to the magic that occurs when the brightest minds get to work together. This is where our true strength lies. In you. In your future colleagues and in all your differences. And of course, in your ideas to improve lives while preserving our planet’s beauty for the generations to come.
   

***Job title***
 AI Ethics \\& Change Management Specialist
   

**Job Overview And Responsibilities**
 Syensqo initiated a fundamental transformation and this transformation positioned digital technologies as key drivers to make it happen. It requires us to change the way we operate and leverage the tremendous amount of knowhow, knowledge, structured and unstructured datasets that today exist in the Group.
   

 Syensqo has decided to create a startup team, Syensqo.ai, dedicated to the AI and Generative AI domain. By taking this role, the Responsible AI \\& Business Analyst will join this team right at its inception. Its mantra is simple: deliver value, with speed and agility while taking no compromise on compliance, ethics, guardrails or regulations. As part of the Syensqo.ai team, The Responsible AI \\& Business Analyst will play a crucial role in helping the business understand, adopt, and apply Responsible AI practices. Acting as a bridge between business users and expert functions (Legal, Compliance, DPO, Cybersecurity, IT, IP/Copyright), the role will translate rules into practical guidance, track actions, and make Responsible AI simple, actionable, and valuable.
   

 The position reports to the Change Manager. S/he will be responsible for :
   

***Key Responsibilities:***
* Adoption \\& Change: Lead awareness campaigns, trainings, and workshops to drive adoption of Responsible AI. Make Responsible AI simple, practical, and relevant for business users.
* Governance \\& Compliance: Coordinate with Legal, Compliance, DPO, Cybersecurity, IT, and IP/Copyright experts to embed Responsible AI in projects. Follow up on AI Act actions and ensure responsibilities are executed.
* Training \\& Guidance: Roll out policies, terms of use, and playbooks. Create role\\-based trainings, guides, and best practices to strengthen understanding and accountability.
* Business Analysis: Gather business needs, track adoption metrics, and turn insights into clear recommendations to improve AI tools, user experience, and value creation.
* Culture \\& Engagement: Act as a connector between business and expert teams, fostering autonomy, flexibility, and strong energy to make things move. Build momentum for Responsible AI across the Group.



**Education And Experience**
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Business, Management, Communication, Digital Transformation, or a related field.
* Solid experience in business analysis, change management, or transformation projects.
* Experience working with cross\\-functional teams (e.g., IT, Legal, Compliance, Cybersecurity, HR).
* Familiarity with AI concepts, Responsible AI principles, or regulatory frameworks (e.g., EU AI Act, GDPR) is a strong plus, but not mandatory.
* Experience in creating policies, training content, or adoption programs is an advantage.


**Skills And Behavioral Competencies**
* Strong business analysis skills: able to gather needs, analyze data, and translate findings into clear actions.
* Excellent change management skills: able to design adoption plans, engage stakeholders, and drive behavioral change.
* Clear and effective communication and facilitation skills, both written and spoken, with the ability to explain complex topics simply.
* Collaboration and influence: experienced in working across functions (Legal, Compliance, IT, Cybersecurity, HR) and aligning diverse stakeholders.
* Problem\\-solving mindset: pragmatic, solution\\-oriented, and focused on delivering value.
* Autonomy and flexibility to adapt to change and manage priorities in a fast\\-moving environment.
* Strong energy and willingness to make things move, creating momentum for adoption.
* Good understanding of Responsible AI principles and digital ethics (or strong willingness to learn).


**Language Skills**
* Fluent in English. good level in French is a plus


**What’s In It For The Candidate**
* Be part of and contribute to a once\\-in\\-a\\-lifetime change journey in Syensqo. Shape how Responsible AI is understood, adopted, and embedded across the Group, and play a key role in ensuring AI is used responsibly and with impact


**About Us**
* Syensqo is a science company developing groundbreaking solutions that enhance the way we live, work, travel and play. Inspired by the scientific councils which Ernest Solvay initiated in 1911, we bring great minds together to push the limits of science and innovation for the benefit of our customers, with a diverse, global team of more than 13,000 associates. Our solutions contribute to safer, cleaner, and more sustainable products found in homes, food and consumer goods, planes, cars, batteries, smart devices and health care applications. Our innovation power enables us to deliver on the ambition of a circular economy and explore breakthrough technologies that advance humanity.
* At Syensqo, we seek to promote unity and not uniformity. We value the diversity that individuals bring and we invite you to consider a future with us, regardless of background, age, gender, national origin, ethnicity, religion, sexual orientation, ability or identity. We encourage individuals who may require any assistance or accommodations to let us know to ensure a seamless application experience. We are here to support you throughout the application journey and want to ensure all candidates are treated equally. If you are unsure whether you meet all the criteria or qualifications listed in the job description, we still encourage you to apply.

title: Analyst (Supply Analytics, Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting\\-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4\\.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100\\+ employees representing 95\\+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose \\-** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

**THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (WITH RELOCATION PROVIDED)
   

  

 Location: Bangkok, Thailand (\\*Not open for remote work)**
**Get to Know our Team:**
 As part of the Supply Analytics, you will be responsible for identifying new partners and opportunities, cultivating a relationship with them, and working together with them to deliver the best outcome for our end customers. You would also be responsible with managing the day\\-to\\-day interaction with the partner and working closely with other teams within Agoda to ensure the partners needs are met.
   

  

 We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win\\-win relationships and leverage Agoda’s unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.
   

  

**The Opportunity:**
 As an Analyst, you will report directly to either the Senior Manager or Associate Director within the Supply Department and this will be an individual contributor role. You will be responsible and fully empowered to work with the partners on the ground. You will be supported by a team within the Supply department and work closely with other Team members within Agoda.
   

  

**In this Role, you’ll get to** 
 :
   

  

* Translate internal briefs into analytical projects (to include refining the initial brief and asking the ‘right questions’, working through potential hypotheses and storyboarding the output)
* Use and analyze data from multiple large\\-scale data warehouses and present statistically strong analysis to a wide range of business stakeholders.
* Proactively identify opportunities for growth within supply and the wider business.
* Drive new analytical initiatives and projects aimed at improving organizational efficiency and shaping Agoda supply.
* Identify, support, and lead projects aimed at scaling up the way the Supply organization leverages on data, insights, and intelligence.
* Automate manual operational processes and present back on time savings gained through modernization of business operations


**What you’ll Need to Succeed** 
 :
   

  

* At least 2\\-5\\+ years of experience working as an Analyst with experience in analytics/data science/insights/strategy/BI
* Advanced working knowledge and hands\\-on experience in SQL
* Strong knowledge and hands\\-on experience in data visualization tools such as Tableau (preferably)
* Expert domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, Python (or R)
* Bachelor’s degree ideally in a business or quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
* A good understanding of statistical modelling knowledge or any machine learning technique knowledge (such as hypothesis testing, regression, logistic regression, random forest, etc.)
* Good stakeholder management experience. Comfortable presenting to senior leadership and C\\-suite.
* Experience in conducting A/B testing experimentation
* Strong experience in finding data insights and provide business recommendation to the business
* A hacker’s mindset – the ability to build simple but clever and elegant solutions to new problems within significant resource, operational and time constraints through deep understanding of the business, creative problem solving, and a wide range of expertise in data, analytics, automation, programming, and prototyping.
* Excellent communicator with superior written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal communication skills.
* Data driven in both decision making and performance measurement.
* Extreme comfort in ambiguous, fast\\-paced environment.
* Ability to multi\\-task, prioritize and coordinate resources.


**It’s Great if you Have:**
* MBA or Masters in a quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
* Program management certifications (e.g. PMI, PRINCE2\\) to compliment your program management experience.
* Asian market experience.
* Travel industry / e\\-commerce / tech / consulting experience.

title: Senior Business Analyste - Finance de Marché (GBIS)
description:
**Missions :** 




  




* Réaliser et présenter le support de pilotage financier de l’activité à destination de l’Exco FIC sur les différentes activités et au niveau des différentes régions (détermination de la rentabilité des tradings desks, analyse de la performance des sales et traders, consommation de fonds propres liés au risque de marché, risque de crédit et risques opérationnels, analyse de la productivité de l’organisation, etc.).
* Mettre en place de nouveaux indicateurs de performance de l’activité (dont indicateurs RSE) permettant d’évaluer les activités au regard des objectifs fixés sur chaque trading desk.
* Optimiser les processus : automatisation et réalisation de tableaux de bord digitalisés permettant au management et traders de visualiser leur performance (ex : PowerBI).
* Réaliser une revue des commentaires d’activités (hebdomadaires et mensuels) sur chaque trading desk.
* Participer aux prévisions budgétaires et au process de consolidation mensuelle des résultats.
* Vous travaillerez en relation étroite avec les traders au Front office, les analystes de valorisations \\& de risques et les Chief Operating Officer.



  





**Profil :** 




  




* De formation Bac \\+4/5 en cycle universitaire ou en école de Commerce spécialisation Finance
* Expérience minimum de 5 ans dans le domaine des marchés financiers.
* Excellentes compétences analytiques et quantitatives, avec la capacité d'interpréter des données complexes et les tendances du marché.
* Une première expérience en banque d’investissement est appréciée.
* Doté(e) d’une bonne aisance relationnelle et de solides connaissances des produits de marché.
* Vous êtes réactif(ve), autonome et organisé(e)
* Travailler en équipe vous stimule et vous enthousiasme : vous n’hésitez pas à demander et offrir de l’aide si besoin.

* La maîtrise du français et de l’anglais est primordiale, en effet vous échangerez quotidiennement avec des équipes situées en Asie et en Europe.

title: Développeur Intégration ERP – Talend & Kinaxis RapidResponse
description:
**Description de l'entreprise** **ALTEN MAROC**, Filiale du leader mondial de l’ingénierie et du conseil en technologie créé en 2008 et présent à Fès, Rabat, Tétouan et Casablanca, compte aujourd’hui plus de 2200 collaborateurs et vise un centre d’excellence de 3300 ALTENiens en fin 2027\\. Elle s’impose aujourd’hui comme un acteur stratégique dans l’accompagnement du développement professionnel des ingénieurs.


Notre mission : répondre aux ambitions technologiques de nos clients — grands donneurs d’ordre internationaux — dans les secteurs de l’automobile, du ferroviaire, de la R\\&D et de l’IT, des télécommunications et des médias.


Rejoindre ALTEN MAroc, c’est intégrer un écosystème d’excellence et bénéficier :

* D’un parcours de carrière personnalisé et évolutif
* D’une politique ambitieuse de développement des compétences
* D’un environnement de travail stimulant, collaboratif et porteur de sens

 **Description du poste**  

Au sein de l’équipe Data \\& Intégration, vous serez responsable de la configuration, du développement et de la maintenance des flux de données entre l’ERP, Talend et Kinaxis RapidResponse. Vous interviendrez sur la mise en place des pipelines de données, leur transformation et leur supervision, dans un contexte de migration technologique et d’industrialisation des processus.

**Missions principales :**

* Configurer et orchestrer les flux de données **ERP**  **Talend**  **Kinaxis RapidResponse**.
* Concevoir, développer et maintenir des **pipelines de données** performants et fiables.
* Contribuer aux projets de **migration vers S/4HANA** et **REDMESH**.
* Implémenter des solutions de **Managed File Transfer (MFT)**.
* Développer des pipelines **Closed\\-loop** et automatiser les processus de monitoring.
* Garantir la **qualité des données** (DQ Reporting) et conduire les **analyses de sécurité** (Security Assessment).
* Intégrer des flux de données **quasi temps réel** via **Talend ESB**.

**Responsabilités**

* Assurer le **développement** et la **configuration technique** des solutions.
* Veiller au **respect des critères d’acceptation** définis lors du sprint planning.
* Collaborer étroitement avec les équipes clientes, notamment les équipes **techniques** et **achats**.
* Fournir un **reporting régulier** sur l’avancement des livrables et des activités.

 **Qualifications** **Compétences techniques :**

* Maîtrise de **Talend ESB** et **Talend Data Integration**.
* Bonne connaissance des environnements **SAP ERP** et **SAP S/4HANA**.
* Expérience avec **Kinaxis RapidResponse**.
* Pratique des protocoles **MFT** (SFTP, FTPS) et de leur implémentation.
* Compétences en **monitoring** et observabilité (ex. : **Grafana**, **Log Analytics**).

**Méthodologies :**

* Pratique confirmée des méthodologies **Agile / Scrum**.
* Expérience dans la **gestion des sprints**, des **user stories** et des critères d’acceptation.

**Soft Skills :**

* Communication claire et proactive avec les équipes internes et externes.
* Capacité à travailler en **offshore**, en **contexte international** et avec des équipes multi\\-disciplinaires (Anglais courant)

**Expérience :**

* **Minimum requis :** 5 ans d’expérience en intégration de systèmes ERP et ETL.
* **Profil idéal :** 7 à 10 ans d’expérience pour un rôle senior, notamment avec une expertise approfondie sur **Talend** et **SAP**

title: Contrôleur de Gestion
description:
**Description de l'entreprise** **ALTEN DELIVERY CENTER MAROC,** Filiale du leader mondial de l’ingénierie et du conseil en technologie créé en 2008 et présent à Fès, Rabat, Tétouan et Casablanca, compte aujourd’hui plus de 2300 consultants et vise un centre d’excellence de 3300 consultants ALTENiens en fin 2027\\. ALTEN Maroc est désormais un acteur majeur de l’insertion professionnelle des ingénieurs. Nous accompagnons nos clients, leaders de l’Industrie dans leurs stratégies de développement dans les domaines de l’automobile, du ferroviaire, de l’IT, de la R\\&D et des Télécoms \\& Médias.


Rejoindre ALTEN MAROC c’est bénéficier :

* Des parcours professionnels diversifiés avec des opportunités de carrière, une mobilité interne, sectorielle, géographique et métiers.
* Des formations certifiantes et diplômantes.
* Des événements réguliers pour combiner bien être et performance

  

**Description du poste**  

En tant que Contrôleur de Gestion, vous serez responsable de :

*Gestion des pointages – compte rendu d’activité (pertinence des saisies/modification/suppression)*

*Convergence data SAP vs outil de pointage*

* ***Analyse des écarts entre l’outil de pointage et SAP :***

***Analyse des écarts de coûts :***

*Identifier les écarts entre les coûts enregistrés dans l’outil de pointage et ceux de SAP.*

*Analyser les causes de ces écarts et faire les actions correctives pour réconcilier les deux systèmes.*

***Analyse des écarts de production :***

*Analyser les écarts liés aux jours de production entre l’outil de pointage et SAP.*

*Identifier les divergences en termes de nombre de jours de travail reportés et ajuster les données pour assurer la cohérence des informations entre les deux systèmes.*

* ***Traitement des anomalies dans l’outil de pointage :***
* ***Gestion des demandes de modification des comptes rendu d’activités :***

*Traiter les demandes de modification liées aux pointages des consultants dans l'outil Smart,*

 **Qualifications**  

* *Bac\\+5 en Gestion, Finance, ou contrôle de gestion.*
* *Ayant 1 à 3 ans d'expérience dans un poste similaire, avec une bonne maitrise d'Excel.*
* *Maitrise de la comptabilité générale et analytique.*
* *Maîtrise des outils de la finance et du contrôle de gestion.*
* *Avoir de très bonnes capacités relationnelles.*
* *Curiosité et capacité de s’adapter rapidement à la structure.*
* *Sens du service client.*
* *Savoir travailler en équipe.*
* *Autonomie et force de proposition dans le cadre de l’amélioration continue de l’existant (tableau de bord, KPI, process).*
* *Fiabilité/ Réactivité et Proactivité.*
* *Bon niveau en français et en anglais ( à l'écrit et à l'orale).*

description:

Marrakech
Stage
Hybride
il y a 1 moi(s)
  
Smilycall le leader du télésecrétariat qui révolutionne l’accompagnement administratif grâce à la digitalisation et l’intelligence artificielle.



Nous recherchons un talent d’exception.



Un(e) Développeur(se) Full Stack passionné(e) par l’IA et l’automatisation, prêt(e) à relever un vrai défi : construire des solutions digitales innovantes qui transforment radicalement la manière dont nous gérons les services de télésecrétariat.



Ce stage n’est pas un simple projet de fin d’études — c’est une immersion dans une entreprise visionnaire où tu développeras des outils concrets, intégreras l’IA pour automatiser des processus complexes, et participeras à la transformation digitale d’un secteur entier.



Profil recherché
* Ingénieur ou Master en Informatique / Génie Logiciel / Data Science (Bac\\+5\\)
* Maîtrise du développement Full Stack (Front\\-end \\+ Back\\-end)
* Notions solides en Intelligence Artificielle et Machine Learning
* Passionné(e) par l’automatisation, les API et l’innovation technologique
* Capable de transformer un besoin métier en solution technique élégante
* Esprit analytique, créatif et orienté résolution de problèmes
* Autonome, rigoureux(se) et avide d’apprendre

Tes futures missions
Développement \\& Digitalisation
* Concevoir et développer des applications web pour digitaliser nos processus de télésecrétariat
* Créer des interfaces utilisateurs intuitives et performantes (dashboards, CRM, outils de gestion)
* Développer des API robustes pour connecter nos différents systèmes
* Optimiser et maintenir notre infrastructure technique

IA \\& Automatisation
* Intégrer des solutions d’IA pour automatiser des tâches répétitives (traitement d’emails, classification de documents, chatbots)
* Développer des systèmes de reconnaissance vocale et de transcription automatique
* Implémenter des outils d’analyse de données et de prédiction
* Créer des workflows intelligents pour améliorer l’efficacité opérationnelle

Innovation Continue
* Faire de la veille technologique sur les nouvelles solutions IA/automatisation
* Proposer et prototyper des innovations qui donnent un avantage concurrentiel
* Participer à l’architecture et à la stratégie technique de l’entreprise

Stack technique recherchée
**Front\\-end :**


* JavaScript / TypeScript (React, Svelte)
* HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS
* Responsive Design \\& UX/UI


**Back\\-end :**


* Node.js, Python
* APIs REST
* Bases de données (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB)


**IA \\& Automatisation :**


* Python (TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit\\-learn)
* APIs IA (OpenAI, Google Cloud AI)
* Automatisation ( n8n)
* NLP (Natural Language Processing)

Conditions

Lieu : Marrakech \\+ télétravail partiel



Rémunération : Attractive \\+ primes sur objectifs



Durée : 2 a 6 mois (stage pré\\-embauche)



CDI garanti à l’issue du stage pour les profils performants



Pourquoi nous rejoindre ?

Parce que tu ne coderas pas “juste pour coder”, mais pour créer des solutions qui ont un impact réel et immédiat.



Ici, tu auras :


* L’autonomie de proposer et implémenter tes propres idées
* L’impact direct sur la croissance de l’entreprise
* L’apprentissage continu avec des technologies de pointe (IA, automatisation)
* La reconnaissance : ton talent sera valorisé et récompensé par un CDI


Tu ne seras pas un développeur parmi d’autres — tu seras l’architecte de notre transformation digitale.



Candidature :

Envoie ton CV \\+ Portfolio GitHub (projets, repos, contributions) à :



Objet : “Développeur Full Stack \\& IA – \\[Ton Prénom]”



Bonus : Un projet personnel en IA/automatisation ou un lien vers une démo de tes réalisations.



Seuls les profils les plus prometteurs seront contactés pour un entretien technique.



Nous recherchons l’excellence, pas la moyenne. Si tu es prêt(e) à construire l’avenir du télésecrétariat avec la tech et l’IA, cette opportunité est pour toi.



Type d’emploi : Temps plein, Stage



Durée du contrat : 6 mois

title: ERP Finance Technical Product Manager (OTE $70,000/year USD), @Sparkrock
description:
Are you a high\\-performing Technical Product Manager with strategic vision and deep technical expertise? Do you want to work for a best\\-in\\-class, 100% remote organization with the brightest talent from around the world? If so, then keep reading…  

At Sparkrock, we help social benefit organizations—like nonprofits, school boards, and government agencies—reach their greatest potential through technology. Every day, over 150,000 people use our ERP and product platforms to work more efficiently, freeing up time and resources to focus on the good they want to achieve.  

As a Technical Product Manager, you will lead the **end\\-to\\-end technical design** of a sophisticated ERP product while collaborating with customers, sales, professional services, and engineering. This role involves more than writing specifications; it requires **owning the vision** for the solution and ensuring its success from idea to implementation.  

In this dynamic role, you’ll be empowered to combine **technical creativity with product leadership**, allowing you to take ownership of innovative projects that truly matter. You will work on products that create a tangible, positive impact on schools and will have the opportunity to design and implement solutions that incorporate **AI, cloud, and other cutting\\-edge technologies**, being at the forefront of technological advancements. Your work will not only involve a significant degree of autonomy but also foster collaboration with a passionate, mission\\-driven team, creating an environment where your ideas can flourish and make a real difference.  

If you’re passionate about delivering compelling customer experiences, **big\\-picture architecture,** and **hands\\-on solutions**, this role is for you! **Responsibilities*** **Requirement Gathering \\& Analysis:** Collaborating with stakeholders to deeply understand business needs and translate them into technical requirements.
* **Solution Design:** Creating architectural designs, workflows, and technical specifications that align with the product vision.Requirements
* **Cross\\-functional collaboration:** Work closely with developers, QA, and business teams to ensure technical feasibility and alignment.
* **Documentation:** Writing detailed specs, diagrams, and documentation to support development, testing, and implementation.
* **Technical Validation:** Conducting research and reviewing existing technologies to ensure the solution is optimal.
* **Iterative Review \\& Feedback:** Engaging stakeholders in reviews and refining deliverables based on feedback.
* **Release Readiness:** Ensuring all technical aspects of a solution are complete, documented, and communicated for seamless implementation.

 **Requirements*** Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
* 5\\+ years in the software industry (as an architect, technical consultant, or developer) with at least 2 years as a Technical Product Manager.
* Knowledge of .Net technologies, including C\\#, .Net
* Experience in designing scalable, secure, high\\-performing solutions.
* Front\\-end technologies such as JavaScript frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js.
* Back\\-end services, APIs, and RESTful architecture.
* Familiarity with cloud\\-based architectures such as Azure or AWS.
* Proficiency in creating data models, workflows, and architectural diagrams.

  

Tools* Development tools (e.g., Visual Studio, Git, Azure DevOps).
* Diagramming tools (e.g., Visio, Lucidchart, or Miro).
* Agile tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence).
* Cloud services (e.g., Azure, AWS).

  

Soft skills* Communication: Exceptional ability to communicate complex technical ideas to both technical and non\\-technical audiences.
* Collaboration: Skilled at working with cross\\-functional teams and managing stakeholder relationships.
* Leadership: Confident in driving technical discussions and leading solution design initiatives.
* Adaptability: Thrives in a fast\\-paced, dynamic environment with changing priorities.
* Curiosity: Passionate about learning new technologies and solving challenging problems.

 **Nice to have*** Experience in the K12 education or Non\\-Profit sector.
* Hands\\-on experience with ERP systems or financial management software.

 **Benefits**  

We don’t call them perks; they’re just part of what makes working at Sparkrock great.* We are 100% remote and global. Live your best life wherever that may be, and never lose out on career opportunities because of it.
* Flexible work hours. We work asynchronously and don’t care when you’re online, just that you deliver great results and are there for our customers.
* We are dedicated to your growth with consistent and meaningful feedback, support in achieving your personal career goals, and access to leading\\-edge tools, playbooks, and technology to amplify your experience.
* Introductions to thought leaders in the space and webinars on cutting\\-edge tech hot topics.
* Stipend to help set up your ideal home office.
* Focus on culture: coffee chats, happy hours, cooking classes, book clubs, and more!

  

We strive to build a team that reflects the diversity of the community we work in and encourage applications from traditionally underrepresented groups such as women, visible minorities, Indigenous peoples, people identifying as LGBTQ2SI, veterans, and people with disabilities.
*All open roles are for existing vacancies unless otherwise communicated to the candidate. We are committed to keeping candidates informed throughout the process and will notify all interviewed applicants of our hiring decision within 45 days of their interview. Sparkrock retains all job postings and related recruitment information for a minimum of three years.*

We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.

title: B2B Marketer
description:
**About Us:** We are Platinumlist – the leading ticketing platform in the MENA region. Since 2009, we’ve helped people find and book events across the UAE, Saudi Arabia, Oman, Bahrain, Qatar, and Kuwait. We’re based in Dubai and work with concerts, sports, attractions, and big brand shows – from local venues to major festivals.


We already have a 20\\+ person marketing team covering design, video, CRM, social media, and ads. But now we’re ready to take our B2B marketing to the next level — and we need someone to lead the way.

**Your Role:** You’ll be the person responsible for all things B2B marketing: lead generation, product campaigns, content, reporting, and internal coordination.


This is a hands\\-on role. You’ll be setting direction and executing — writing briefs, managing timelines, launching campaigns, and improving how we work.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Launch and manage lead generation campaigns on LinkedIn, Meta, Google, etc.
* Create seasonal and product\\-based campaigns for ticketing solutions (attractions, sports, etc.)
* Build and update materials that help sales close deals faster (PDFs, decks, landing pages).
* Sync with the sales team weekly — what leads worked, what didn’t.
* Keep our CRM (HubSpot) clean and organized.
* Own B2B workflows in HubSpot — from lead forms to follow\\-ups.
* Support the sales team with lists, automations, and tracking.
* Make sure everything connects smoothly — from ad click to sales call.
* Run our LinkedIn presence — company page \\+ helping team members post updates.
* Keep B2B pages up to date with products, case studies, and success stories.
* Publish B2B newsletters with fresh updates, wins, and product news.
* Plan content campaigns: “Why choose Platinumlist”, “How we helped XYZ”, “New feature drops”, etc.
* Use AI tools (like ChatGPT) for copy, content ideas, and reporting.
* Use n8n or similar to automate ops: lead routing, notifications, etc.
* Build reports with the Data team to track what’s working — and what’s not.

Create simple dashboards to show campaign lead revenue.  
* 

**Requirements**

* You have 2–3 years of B2B marketing or demand generation experience.
* You’re confident with HubSpot or a similar CRM.
* You’ve worked closely with sales teams and understand what makes a lead “qualified.”
* You’re organized and can manage content and campaigns from A to Z.
* You like figuring things out, improving processes, and using tools to make life easier.

You write clearly and know what works in B2B (especially on LinkedIn).  
* 

**Bonus Points:**

* Experience with events, SaaS, or CRM tools.
* You’ve built flows in n8n, Zapier, or Make.
* You know basic analytics (GA4, Looker, Data Studio, etc.).
* You enjoy async work and don’t need to be micromanaged.

You’re a fan of good marketing and clean design.  
* 

**Benefits**

* Creative Freedom: We value innovation and fresh ideas—no micromanagement, just results\\-driven creativity.
* Fast Decision\\-Making: Enjoy an agile work environment without corporate bureaucracy.
* Work\\-Life Balance: Five\\-day work week (Monday–Friday).
* Access to the most exciting events in the region.

title: Application Production Support
description:
**Mission**
 L’Application Production Support assure la production applicative aussi bien sur la partie support technique que fonctionnel pour un Métier ou une chaîne applicative Métier donnée. Elle/Il est la/le garant(e) du maintien en conditions opérationnelles du service. Elle/Il s’assure du bon déroulé des traitements (batch, transfert…) et du bon fonctionnement au sens applicatif du terme (données métiers pertinentes, résultat fonctionnel, exécution correcte des workflows applicatifs…).
   

  

 Dans un contexte d’accélération des changements, elle/il gère les différentes releases sur son périmètre.
   

  

 Elle/Il intervient non seulement en cas d’incidents pour restaurer le service mais également en préventif grâce à l’analyse des données et à l’automatisation permettant ainsi d’améliorer la qualité de service et l’expérience utilisateur. Elle/Il agît en tant qu’expert(e) auprès des ITOps notamment sur les exigences de production et d’infrastructure.
   

  

**Activités principales**
**Assurer le support technique et fonctionnel aux utilisateurs**
* Gérer les incidents sur le périmètre de rattachement en veillant à restaurer le service au plus vite en toute transparence vis\\-à\\-vis du Métier : Référencement, communication, coordination, correction, rédaction des PIR (Post Incident Review)
* Garantir l’éradication des problèmes
* S’assurer de la bonne gestion des accès applicatifs en suivant les préconisations s’appliquant à son périmètre
* Contribuer à la construction des tableaux de bord de la production et engager les actions définies pour l’amélioration du service


 Mettre en oeuvre le monitoring et superviser les composants techniques et fonctionnels de l’application
   

  

* Mettre en place le dispositif et le paramétrage permettant de monitorer son périmètre
* Suivre le bon déroulement des traitements suivant le plan de production
* Contrôler la qualité fonctionnelle et technique des interfaces/transferts entre applications
* Monitorer l’état des composants techniques de l’application
* Contrôler le bon déroulement des sauvegardes et restaurations applicatives


**Orchestrer et gérer les différentes releases sur son périmètre**
**Créer et enrichir le référentiel documentaire de l’application. Maintenir les procédures d’exploitation**
* Rédiger et Maintenir les procédures d’exploitation
* Rédiger et Maintenir un référentiel de documentations techniques
* Participer à la rédaction et revue du manuel utilisateur de l’application porté par les équipes développements
* Enrichir et mettre à jour une base de connaissances


**Apporter son analyse et mesurer, analyser et améliorer les performances des composants techniques et fonctionnels de l’application afin d’améliorer l’expérience utilisateur**
* Analyser et suivre les données de performances applicative ( traces, logs, évènements,… ) pour améliorer la qualité de service ainsi que l’expérience utilisateur.
* En lien avec les besoins métiers, gérer les éléments de capacité de l’application
* Effectuer des purges de données en accord avec le métier


**Réaliser l’intégration technique des applications en s’appuyant sur les produits et services existants afin de réduire les délais de mise en œuvre**
* Effectuer l’intégration technique des applications en s’appuyant sur les produits et services existants afin de réduire les délais de mise en œuvre
* Définir et mettre en œuvre le monitoring et faciliter la supervision des services
* Planifier les traitements batch
* Assurer un rôle d’expertise auprès des ITOps notamment sur les exigences de production et d’infrastructure
* Gérer des demandes d’évolutions fonctionnelles
* Estimer la charge APS de mise en œuvre des évolutions
* Définir un planning en lien avec les différentes équipes (Développement, Exploitation, Métiers…)


 Contribuer aux processus adhérents à l’activité en respectant les exigences et en procédant aux remédiations nécessaires
   

  

**Compétences métier**
* Connaissances informatiques
* Tests informatiques
* Connaissance de l’environnement local
* Connaissance de l’organisation
* Capacité à collaborer / travail d’équipe
* Résilience
* Capacité d’organisation
* Capacité à partager/transmettre des connaissances


 Compétences transversales
   

  

* Capacité à élaborer et à adapter un processus
* Capacité d’analyse
* Capacité à définir des indicateurs de performance pertinent
* Capacité à gérer un projet
* Capacité à inspirer les autres et générer l’engagement


 Méthodologies / Outils / Technologies
   

  

* Ordonnanceur, Middleware Axway Transfer cft, outils de production Service Now
* Linux, Unix, Windows
* Splunk, Dynatrace
* Python, Jenkins, ansible Tower, Shell, SQL.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
At Numrah, we build intelligent, modern applications that combine cutting\\-edge engineering with practical machine learning. We're looking for a Machine Learning Engineer who is deeply grounded in ML theory and excited to Design and implement ML solutions from ideation to production Fine\\-tune and integrate LLMs Deploy and monitor LLM\\-powered features at scale in real\\-world products Collaborate with engineers and product teams to build intelligent, user\\-facing features Write clean, scalable code and detailed technical documentation Stay current with the latest in ML research, LLM capabilities, and MLOps best practices
 



 What You’ll Do
 


* Design and implement ML solutions from ideation to production
* Fine\\-tune and integrate LLMs
* Deploy and monitor LLM\\-powered features at scale in real\\-world products
* Collaborate with engineers and product teams to build intelligent, user\\-facing features
* Write clean, scalable code and detailed technical documentation
* Stay current with the latest in ML research, LLM capabilities, and MLOps best practices



 Must\\-Haves
 


1. Be an Arabic speaker
2. Have at least 1\\-2 year of non\\-internship experience in Machine Learning
3. Strong ML and DL theory background, you don't just use things, you know how they are working under the hood.
4. Production experience training and fine\\-tuning LLMs, with practical knowledge of transformer architectures in NLP applications.
5. Experience with MLOps best practices.
6. Collaborative mindset and ability to communicate technical ideas clearly



 Nice\\-to\\-Have
 


* Experience deploying LLM\\-based features to production
* Knowledge of parameter\\-efficient fine\\-tuning (LoRA, QLoRA, PEFT)
* Familiarity with RAG pipelines and vector databases (e.g., Pinecone, Weaviate)
* Understanding of model serving and inference optimization (quantization, batching)
* Exposure to MLOps practices (monitoring, versioning, CI/CD for ML)
* Experience with RESTful APIs, Docker, and cloud platforms (GCP, AWS, or Azure)
* Interest in NLP applications, smart assistants, or chatbot systems

title: Education Sales Consultant
description:
As our **Education Sales Consultant**, you will be the primary liaison between our company and prospect clients . Your work will involve managing the full sales cycle, from initial outreach to closing, by focusing on the unique needs of the education sector.

Your core responsibilities will include:

* **Active Communication:** Proactively engage with customers and prospects face\\-to\\-face or via telephone to build strong, lasting relationships.
* **Effective Presentation:** Clearly and persuasively communicate the features, benefits, and pedagogical value of our products or services to potential clients.
* **Needs Analysis \\& Customization:** Analyze customer needs to provide personalized support and tailor product demonstrations throughout the sales process.
* **Goal Achievement:** Meet or exceed periodic sales targets and quotas consistently.
* **Strategic Planning:** Design and implement new and creative sales strategies to penetrate new markets and expand existing business.
* **Market Intelligence:** Closely monitor constantly changing market trends, competitor activities, and developments within the education sector.
* **Feedback Loop:** Capture and relay customer feedback to help improve and refine product offerings and proposals.
* **Reporting:** Accurately report on education sales processes and present findings to relevant management units.
* **Administrative Tasks:** Perform administrative duties assigned by the organization as needed.
* **Professional Development:** Maintain professional growth by keeping up\\-to\\-date with industry knowledge and skills.

**What You'll Bring**

* **Education:** Bachelor's degree (preferably in Business, Education, or a related field).
* **Communication Skills:** Exceptional verbal, written communication, presentation, and negotiation skills.
* **Analysis:** Strong ability to analyze customer needs and propose solution\\-oriented offerings.
* **Motivation:** Highly self\\-motivated, target\\-driven, and capable of working independently.
* **Tech Savvy:** Proficiency with CRM software (e.g., Salesforce) and Microsoft Office Suite.

**What We Offer**

* A competitive base salary plus a rewarding, **uncapped commission structure**.
* Comprehensive benefits package (Health , etc.).
* Opportunities for career growth and professional advancement.
* The chance to contribute to meaningful work that directly impacts student success and teaching effectiveness.
* A collaborative team environment and dedicated sales training.

**Ready to Make a Real Impact in Education?**

If you are a motivated individual eager to connect educators with the tools that transform classrooms, we encourage you to apply!

Type d'emploi : Temps plein, CDI, CDD  
Durée du contrat : 12 mois

Rémunération : à partir de 2\\.500,00DH par mois

Marrakech

il y a 2 semaine(s)

title: Responsable solutions (H/F)
description:
Vous interviendrez dans le cadre du département Offres et Catalogues. Ce département accompagne le processus de mise sur le marché des offres et des projets complexes du domaine Marketing Grand Public Résidentiel et Pro, en mettant en œuvre, au travers de projets métiers, les solutions SI permettant leur commercialisation et leur gestion.
 



  





 Vous aurez en charge le pilotage des projets métiers du domaine, de l’étude à la généralisation.
 



  





 Vous serez amené à piloter un ou plusieurs projets sur les thématiques du marché PRO PME liées notamment à l’amélioration de la production Fibre, aux programmes ALL IP/arrêt du RTC, aux déploiements d’offres innovantes de téléphonie d’entreprises, aux Offres convergentes Pros, ainsi qu’à de nouveaux services à valeur ajoutée offerts en partenariat avec des acteurs clefs du marché.
 



  





 Vous serez également l’interlocuteur SI privilégié des métiers du domaine et accompagnez la mise en œuvre des projets métiers sur le volet SI depuis le lancement de l’étude jusqu’à la généralisation complète pour les projets transverses conduits en TTM.
 



  





 Vous pilotez à ce titre les actions qui participent à la conception et à la construction de la solution SI, vous garantissez le respect des exigences métier et assurez le reporting et la communication du projet.
 



  





 Vous vous appuierez dans les phases amont sur le responsable d’études transverse en charge de la conception de la solution SI, ainsi que sur les acteurs fonctionnels qualification, coordination fonctionnelle qui seront nécessaires après le kick off du projet
 



  





 Vous travaillez ainsi en liaison avec le Responsable Projet Orange France avec les différents métiers du domaine (SAV, Commande production, BI, Services client, UI…)
 



  





 De ce fait, vous assumez la solution SI et ses limites en regard de ces contraintes vis\\-à\\-vis de vos métiers.
 



  





 Les modes de fonctionnement et de gouvernance projets évoluent chez Orange. Vous serez donc amené à travailler avec des projets de type cycle en V comme sur des projets agiles coordonnés au sein d’un train.
 



  





 Suivant les projets, vous travaillerez selon la gouvernance mise en place dans une chaine de valeur ou en comité TTM.
 



  





**Profil recherché:** 




 De formation supérieure en Informatique avec une expérience professionnelle de 10 ans minimum dans les systèmes d’information.
 



  





**Compétences recherchées :** 



* Capacité à travailler en transverse avec des experts de différentes entités (SI, marketing, juridique, processus, position de travail, technique \\- réseaux, plateformes de services, etc…).
* Maitrise du pilotage de projet sur un périmètre applicatif ou transverse
* Capacité à mobiliser des acteurs en dehors de son périmètre de rattachement
* Un esprit de synthèse permettant d’appréhender les problématiques complexes de chaque projet dans lesquelles des éléments de nature très différentes interviennent (commercial, juridique, réglementaire, technique, ergonomie, etc.).
* Une maitrise de l’art de la négociation
* Maitrise de la communication orale et écrite ainsi qu’un leadership naturel afin de piloter des groupes de travail multidisciplinaires.
* Vous allez à l’essentiel et recherchez en permanence l’optimisation de la valeur client et business dans le pilotage de vos projets.
* Idéalement vous connaissez le domaine SI des offres pros internet et convergentes et ses processus associés (catalogue, commande, livraison, facturation, SAV, Business Intelligence, etc.) ou vous apprendrez à le connaître !

title: Consultant Freelance Data Analyst Engineer (H/F)
description:
Offre de mission – Consultant Freelance Data Analyst Engineer (H/F) – Casablanca
   

  

 Client : Cabinet de conseil en digitalisation – Secteur du luxe
   

  

 Démarrage : ASAP
   

  

 Durée : Jusqu’à fin mars (minimum)
   

  

 Rythme : 5 jours / semaine
   

  

 Lieu : Casablanca (modalités hybrides possibles selon organisation du client)
   

  

 Contexte de la mission
   

  

 Notre client, un cabinet de conseil spécialisé dans la digitalisation et opérant auprès d’acteurs majeurs du secteur du luxe, recherche un Consultant Freelance Data Analyst / Data Engineer (H/F) pour renforcer son équipe Data.
   

  

 Votre rôle consistera à accompagner les équipes métiers et techniques dans la mise en place de dashboards Looker fiables, robustes et orientés business, notamment sur la partie commerciale.
   

  

 Responsabilités principales
   

  

* Développement et structuration des modèles de données
* Concevoir, développer et maintenir les modèles de données via DBT.
* Transformer les données brutes en données structurées, fiables et prêtes à être consommées.
* Qualité et fiabilité des données
* Implémenter et configurer des tests de qualité de la donnée (ex : Montecarlo).
* Garantir la cohérence, la disponibilité et l’intégrité des informations utilisées par les équipes métiers.
* Recette technique
* Participer aux phases de recette technique.
* Valider la conformité et la performance des développements avant leur mise en production.
* Développement LookML
* Concevoir, maintenir et optimiser les modèles LookML afin de définir la couche sémantique de Looker.
* Assurer la pertinence et la scalabilité des modèles.
* Création de visualisations \\& dashboards
* Développer des dashboards et visualisations (Looks) dans Looker en collaboration avec le Product Manager.
* Traduire les besoins métiers en solutions visuelles pertinentes, claires et actionnables.


 🎯 Profil recherché (H/F)
   

  

* Consultant freelance confirmé (3–5 ans d’expérience minimum en data engineering / data analysis).
* Maîtrise de DBT, Looker et du LookML.
* Connaissance des outils de data quality, idéalement Montecarlo.
* Bonne compréhension des enjeux business, notamment commerciaux.
* Expérience dans un contexte international ou premium/luxe appréciée.
* Capacité à être autonome, rigoureux et force de proposition.
* Bon niveau en Anglais.

title: BC Supply Chain Management Consultant
description:
**Who Is Sa.global**
 sa.global addresses industry challenges through vertical\\-focussed solutions. Leveraging modern technologies like AI and Copilot, we empower organizations to make intelligent decisions and act faster. Our solutions and services are 100% based on Microsoft business applications and the Microsoft Business cloud, and benefit advertising and marketing, accounting, architecture and engineering, consulting, homebuilding, legal, and IT services companies. Through our industry\\-first approach, we want to put solutions in the hands of people closest to the problem to enable organizations to act faster and make intelligent decisions.
   

  

 Over 800,000 users in 80 countries around the world rely on sa.global's industry\\-focused expertise to gain value faster, adapt quickly to changes, and build for the future. We have 30\\+ years of real\\-world experience, we are an 11\\-time winner of the Microsoft Dynamics Partner of the Year Award, and we’ve been a part of Microsoft’s elite Inner Circle for 12 years. Our global organization has a 1000\\-member team across 25 countries.
   

  

 For more information, visit www.saglobal.com.
   

  

**Why Choose sa.global**
 Open, flexible, vibrant, collaborative, and diverse – these are just some of the terms that our employees use to describe the culture at sa.global. We believe and encourage innovative and dynamic thinking. Our culture and values give us the extra edge to help us scale greater heights.
   

  

 Led by our Core Values:
 **Agile, Capable, and Committed** 
 , which form an integral part of who we are, we constantly strive to provide an inclusive work environment. Our employees come from varied cultural and social backgrounds, and we strive each day to work towards making sa.global a great place to work.
   

  

**Values of sa.global**
* Contribute towards a working environment that represents “one sa.global” where everyone is seen as an equal, and equality and diversity is championed.
* Interact with a wide variety of colleagues, customers, and stakeholders at all levels with respect, courtesy, and professionalism.
* Come as you are, make work fun \\& others successful, and foster an always learning mentality.


**Key Responsibilities**
* Conducting necessary reviews, analysis of the client’s supply chain processes and consulting with the client and project team to ensure the project’s success.
* Hands\\-on implementation and deployment of D365 Business Central (Dynamics NAV) and Project Management, D365 solution architect and consulting services to customers.
* Working collaboratively with customer stakeholders to implement and leverage D365 Business Central (Dynamics NAV) using best development and implementation methodologies.
* Demonstrate and enhance supply chain management concepts and research techniques, to exercise discretion and make judgments on how to configure the system.
* Responsible for documenting the business requirements which express what actions a solution must take and what outcome is expected.
* Collaborates with stakeholders throughout the organization to ensure a comprehensive set of requirements, aligned to business objectives, gaining full understanding of current and future state business processes.
* Collaborate, manage and lead meetings with functional/technical consultants and client/end\\-users.
* Supports the Microsoft Dynamics NAV or D365 BC application to achieve the customer’s business requirements.
* Facilitate the customer’s decision\\-making process and develop the functional design document that will drive the development process (if modifications/customizations are required, either to processes or to the Microsoft Dynamics application).
* Responsible for conducting user acceptance testing and training customer resources to successfully use and maintain the Microsoft Dynamics NAV or D365 BC application.
* Liaise with product vendors on any issues relevant to our customers or the company’s services.
* End to End management co\\-ordination of the project and responsible for the successful completion of the project within a stipulated budget.
* Ensure that the technical aspects of projects meet required standards for functionality, operability and documentation.
* Ensure timesheets are entered and processed accurately and responsible for invoicing in relation to projects.
* Work with project managers and team leaders to cater for resource changes across projects.
* Assist with any other necessary task as required.
* Production support as required.


**Skills And Qualifications**
* Strong Supply Chain Management consulting experience is a must.
* Experience in D365 Business Central (Dynamics NAV) software implementations is a plus.
* Strong understanding and application of Project Management competencies including Scope, time, costs, quality, HR, communications, risk, procurements, and integration.
* Strong understanding of supply chain management industry\\-standard business practices.
* Experience with enterprise resource planning systems using Manufacturing or Trade/Logistics modules is a plus.
* Strong interpersonal relations and teamwork orientation.
* Strong English and French business writing and verbal communication skills.
* Ability to multi\\-task, organize, prioritize and meet deadlines.
* Experience leading large complex technology projects.
* Business intelligence understanding including Reporting and Analytics.
* Possess a deep understanding of software implementation lifecycles, development methodologies, operating systems, technical platforms/architecture, and application servers.


**Personal Attributes**
* Highly confident with providing consulting support and training to users.
* Strong attention to detail and a keen desire to deliver the highest quality solutions to customers.
* Solves complex problems with creative solutions.
* Self\\-Starter with ability to handle multiple tasks and shifting priorities.
* Think clearly and calmly under pressure.
* Places emphasis on client satisfaction.
* Business analysis.
* Client\\-facing skills.


**Education**
* Minimum Bachelor’s degree, preferably in Information technology, operations management, computer science or equivalent professional qualification.
* Relevant Microsoft certifications are preferable.
* Project Management certification is highly desirable.

title: Outbound Sales Development Representative (French/English)
description:
Casablanca, Morocco
   

  

 Onsite
   

  

 Apply Now
   

  

 Role Overview
   

  

 Plutus21 Partners is seeking a bilingual (French/English) Outbound Sales Development Representative to drive new business opportunities by proactively reaching out to target accounts. In this role, you will identify key decision\\-makers, understand their compliance needs, and schedule discovery meetings for the sales team. This position plays a vital role in building pipeline through strategic outreach and close collaboration with Marketing and Business Development.
   

  

 This role follows Eastern Standard Time (EST) business hours.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Proactively prospect into an assigned new logo account list to identify contacts who may need our solutions.
* Continually learn to diagnose client’s compliance challenges and how we might help them.
* Develop and nurture relationships with key buying personas within prospect accounts and secure commitment to discuss their compliance needs and our solutions in more detail with a designated sales representative.
* Schedule discovery meetings between qualified potential buyers and the sales team that results in closed/won business.
* Collaborate with assigned sales representative(s) on call/email campaigns within targeted accounts.
* Gather and document market intelligence from prospect accounts on competitive solutions that they may be using.
* Implement outbound prospecting campaigns developed by Marketing, Product and Commercial Leadership.
* Document engagement activity within Salesforce.com.


**Required Qualifications**
* 2 or more years of successful sales prospecting or business development experience preferred.
* Bachelor’s degree required.
* Proficient in the Microsoft Office suite and Salesforce.com.
* English and French Proficiency


 Demonstrated Competencies
   

  

* Results and Growth\\-Oriented: Proven record of consistently achieving monthly, quarterly, and annual prospecting and lead generation goals in a high growth organization.
* Interpersonal Skills: Ability to effectively communicate with others, both internally and externally.
* Negotiator: Utilizes analytical skills to identify and solve customer business problems. Ability to learn and leverage the Value Connection Mindset or similar diagnostic sales methodology.
* Self\\-Management (Time and priorities): Excellent time management, attention to detail and overall strong organizational skills.
* Continuous Learner: Aptitude and desire to master new industry and technical product suite. Instinctively curious about your clients’ business, performance goals and connect how we can help them succeed.
* Teamwork: Team\\-player, who collaborates with ease up and down the organization.
* Flexibility: Thrives in a dynamic, fast\\-paced business environment.


 Apply Now

title: Cluster Director of Revenue
description:
**Company Description**
 Welcome to Sofitel Casablanca Tour Blanche, a 5\\-star hotel that combines French luxury with a Moroccan soul and unique joie de vivre. Gastronomy, wellbeing and exceptional views enhance your stay.
   

  

 With a privileged location near the Old Medina, the business district and the port, your stay is in the beating heart of Casablanca. Our teams are at your service, creating personalised experiences for beautiful memories of your time in Morocco.
   

  

**Job Description**
* Play an active role in the strategic planning, marketing plan and budgeting processes, challenging the strategy with the General Manager \\& Director of Sales and Marketing.
* Prepare the annual topline budget for approval and track achievement, across all revenue streams: rooms, F\\&B, MICE, Spa \\& other ancillaries.
* Monitor transient and group book pace to determine pricing and availability controls for all reservation distribution sources.
* Monitor key indicators of hotel performance. Chairing and preparing analysis \\& materials for the weekly revenue strategy meetings.
* Track and analyze competitive set pricing and yield strategies, gaining the ability to predict the competitive set reaction to changes in the marketplace.
* Produce and analyze current and historical demand including lost business turndown, rooms on the books, competitive set and market trends to aid in more accurate forecasting.
* Monitor third party intelligence sources to identify revenue opportunities (OTA, GDS, market studies). Keep current with industry changes and how it may impact demand.
* Work with Director of Sales and Director of Marketing teams to encourage strategic selection of the right piece of business, determine effective and engaging offers.
* Work with Reservations and Front Desk to ensure the highest level of guest service is maintained while maximizing profit. Provides training on upselling and negotiating techniques.
* Revenue Culture: Liaise with all teams to ensure revenue management principles are understood and followed. Provides guided learning so that all areas of the hotel that impact revenue are fully aware of the hotel Revenue Management strategies and understand their role in the plan.
* Maintain and improves rate standards, policies, and procedures.
* Lead/manage a team, whether functionally or hierarchically (“RM apprentices”, reservation, distribution desks).


**Qualifications**
**Personal background:**
* At least 5 years of experience in a full\\-time Revenue Management position in hospitality or another industry.
* Experience/exposure in the hotel operations and/or in luxury operations.
* Graduate degree in university or school.
* Analytical approach to problem solving, strategic thinker.
* Strong numerical reasoning.
* Strong business acumen.
* Team leader, with the ability to inspire. Ability to work cohesively as part of a team.
* Demonstrate strong communication skills both verbally and in writing.
* Composed and confident in dealing with luxury clientele.
* Command of PMS, CRS, RMS, GDS \\& channel management systems.
* Good level in Excel and database management.
* Strong knowledge of revenue, pricing, market intelligence digital platforms.


**Personal Competencies**
* Communicates with impact, clearly and consistently to ensure understanding (in English and French languages).
* Seeks opportunities to self\\-develop and is detail minded, highly organized and time efficient to ensure goals are met.
* Monitors market trends and understands their impact on the strategic plans of the business.
* Provides practical solutions to complex operational problems.
* Identifies opportunities for business improvement and change. Develops and implements change initiatives.
* Understands financial data and the operations of their own and other departments.
* Coordinates, directs, coaches and monitors team resources and activities to achieve goals.


**Functional Competencies**
* Looks for relevant information and builds understanding of events and economic issues impacting the room revenue of the hotel. Understands competition and can highlight La Maison offers differentiators from the competition.
* Leads Revenue Management aspects of strategic planning, marketing planning, budgeting processes, and tactical initiatives across all profit centers (e.g., analyzes for optimal customer mix and applies findings)
* Optimizes the total revenue in the business scope, by creating accurate forecasts and monitoring the global revenue performance of the hotel (by distribution channel, segment, seasons, day patterns…)
* Has a sound understanding of Accor/La Maison RM \\& Pricing offers in his business scope (specific region, brand, segment...) and beyond (global offers). Builds a RM \\& Pricing offers’ value proposition for all the hotel revenue streams of the hotel.
* Has full command, administers and is recognized in the hotel as a master user/trainer of RM, Pricing \\& Distribution systems and data/analytics applications.
* Promotes and acts as an ambassador of Revenue Management \\& Pricing practice and application in the hotel and beyond (external partners and stakeholders) through decision making, training, mentoring, and the delivery of key presentations.


 Additional Information
   

  

 Diversity \\& Inclusion for Accor means welcoming each and everyone and respecting their differences by giving priority only to qualities and skills in extending employment and development opportunities. Our ambition is to provide meaningful employment, a warm and welcoming culture, excellent working conditions and to promote the development of all people, including those with disabilities.
